name: shader_compiler
description: Glslang ported to be usable via Zig's build system.

releases.name: v1.1.0
releases.body:
This is the last release to target Zig 0.15.1.

## What's Changed
* Fix: update deprecated u29 usage to std.mem.Alignment by @DoctorQuark in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/pull/9
* Update Zig by @DialecticalMaterialist in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/pull/11
* [Adds support for debug symbols](https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/commit/5b78f7230917d0d75352ec8a32dbe3bc727cef82)
* [Adds support for default version, and preamble](https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/commit/acd89633bcb07bdd2f49d2d383f46795d48fbfdd)
* [Fixes bug that broke some shader includes on Windows](https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/commit/e430852c379d64db8ca29d618cfcc337429d8660)
* [Fixes bug that lead to outputting unoptimized code](https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/commit/dbb7d42a646aefaa22902a3d37a950fc66bc0a74)
* [Allows setting defines from the command line](https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/commit/13dbfba253511757b55fa8ec35399c4814482089)
* [Add stage argument](https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/commit/8cab09de7de957c778e3cd47980cda30414ce7b5)
* [Fixes bug where warnings weren't shown if compilation succeeded](https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/commit/be315000d9a5c17ab9491c8655470afc0bfb3d89)
* [Makes it possible to use shader compiler as a library](https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/commit/6ec4975fdf41e88102de8351edd2cd1936a30c3c)
* [Fixes output paths with separators on Windows](https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/commit/c24b915eb66369b8bd3115a96508ca5c9a445497)

## New Contributors
* @DoctorQuark made their first contribution in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/pull/9
* @DialecticalMaterialist made their first contribution in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/pull/11

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/compare/v0.1.0...v1.1.0

releases.name: v1.0.0
releases.body:
This release targets Zig v0.14.0. Thanks to everyone who contributed! :)

## What's Changed
* GL_ARB_shading_language_include by @MasonRemaley in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/pull/3
* avoid usingnamespace by @andrewrk in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/pull/4
* update to new structopt API by @andrewrk in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/pull/6
* --optimize-size instead of --optimize-small in zig build example in the readme by @rpkak in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/pull/7
* Add options for validator by @antlilja in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/pull/8

## New Contributors
* @MasonRemaley made their first contribution in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/pull/3
* @andrewrk made their first contribution in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/pull/4
* @rpkak made their first contribution in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/pull/7
* @antlilja made their first contribution in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/pull/8

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/shader_compiler/commits/v0.14.0
